docs.snippet: LONDON, Dec. 20--A twelvenation subcommittee will visit the United States in the next few weeks to inspect sites for the permanent home of the United Nations.

headline.main: UNO GROUP TO TOUR LOCATIONS IN U.S; 12-Nation Subcommittee to Pick 6 Prospective Sites, Leave Final Choice to Assembly

byline.original: By SYDNEY GRUSON By Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: LONDON, Dec. 22--The United Nations Organization's Preparatory Commission, yielding to British and Russian desires, voted today to place the permanent headquarters of the new peace agency in the eastern United States.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Dec. 22--The United Nations Organization's Preparatory Commission, yielding to British and Russian desires, voted today to place the permanent headquarters of the new peace agency in the eastern United States.

byline.original: By JOHN H. CRIDER Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: George Cornell Tarler, former Acting United States Ambassador to Turkey and Acting Minister to Uruguay, Paraguay and Cuba, died on Wednesday in his home, 930 Fifth Avenue. His age was 69.

docs.snippet: LONDON, Dec. 27--A United Nations committee narrowed the choice of a seat for the new world peace organization to ten Atlantic Seaboard states today after eliminating the South because of racial prejudice and the Middle West because of isolationism.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Dec. 27--A United Nations committee narrowed the choice of a seat for the new world peace organization to ten Atlantic Seaboard states today after eliminating the South because of racial prejudice and the Middle West because of isolationism.
docs.abstract: subcom narrows choice of UNO seat to 10 US Atlantic Seaboard states

headline.main: UNO'S HUNT FOR HOME KEPT IN TEN STATES

byline.original: By Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: LONDON, Dec. 28 (AP)--A spokesman for the United Nations Organization's Interim Committee said tonight the committee would choose a site in the "general areas" of either Boston or New York City as a permanent home for the organization.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Dec. 28 (AP)--A spokesman for the United Nations Organization's Interim Committee said tonight the committee would choose a site in the "general areas" of either Boston or New York City as a permanent home for the organization.
docs.abstract: UNO narrows site hdqrs to NY or Boston areas; decision bars Phila; list of potential sites
